sellerCard.oneLiner: Strengthen Your Online Presence with CMS Experts
sellerCard.description:
I am a ùó£ùóÆùòÄùòÄùó∂ùóºùóªùóÆùòÅùó≤ WordPress developer with 3+ years of experience crafting custom, high-performing websites. My specialty is blending intuitive design with seamless functionality to transform ideas into impactful online solutions. 

I deliver modern, elegant, and clean designs, ensuring fast, polished results with meticulous attention to detail. Committed to meeting deadlines, I strive to provide effective and efficient solutions tailored to your needs.

Reach out today to see how I can help you meet your WordPress development needs effectively and efficiently.

Whether you're looking to build a ùóªùó≤ùòÑ ùòÄùó∂ùòÅùó≤ ùó≥ùóøùóºùó∫ ùòÄùó∞ùóøùóÆùòÅùó∞ùóµ or ùóøùó≤ùòÉùóÆùó∫ùóΩ ùóÆùóª ùó≤ùòÖùó∂ùòÄùòÅùó∂ùóªùó¥ ùóºùóªùó≤, I am committed to excellence in every project.


With over 05 years of experience as a skilled WordPress developer, I've enjoyed constructing over 450+ WordPress websites for clients worldwide.


Services I Offer:


  • Fully Completed Functional Website Development
  • Fully Responsive (Mobile+Tablet+Desktop) Design
  • Attractive Layout with Color Combination
  • SEO Friendly Structure & Speed Optimization
  • eCommerce Functionality
  • Theme Customization
  • Setup Any Payment Gateway
  • Live Chat & Bug Fixing
  • Social Media Integration

Why Choose Me?

  • Clear Communication & Timely Delivery

Please get in touch with me with your project details, and I'll provide a tailored quote.

slide.name: build wordpress website, custom wordpress website, business website development

questionsAndAnswers.question: What requirements do I need to provide to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You need to provide me with hosting information/ WordPress login information, your logo, an outline of your website ( rough sketch or blueprint), and content for your website, including text, images, videos, etc.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you redesign an existing website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can redesign an existing WordPress web-site based on your requirements.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide hosting and domains?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, I do not. You will provide the domain and hosting.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will the website be responsive?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, the web-site will be responsive and fitted to all screen sizes and devices.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide support after completing the order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I offer 30 days of free customer support after completing the order.

reviews.comment: I couldn't have been happier with the results; they went above and beyond to work with me. I didn't provide too much content but they worked with me over the course of a few meetings and the site turned out very well. I'm looking forward to using it and will definitely use the service again in the future if I need to build another site.

seller_response.comment: Thanks, I'm glad you got what you wanted. I would love to work with you again.

reviews.comment: I paid $400 my site still not posted every time you ask for a change.  It takes 3 days for a reply you're wasting your money dealing with this person I think this is fraud I will be contacting fiver for my money back

seller_response.comment: Unfortunately, this rating does not accurately reflect the service I provided. I developed the website based on the client‚Äôs instructions and provided the agreed-upon design. As part of the agreement, I offered unlimited revisions and always ensured to ask the client if they needed any changes upon completion. However, the client was not very collaborative and displayed aggressive behavior during the project timeline. Additionally, the client did not provide clear instructions for this project. To clarify the requirements, I proactively suggested a meeting. Here is the screenshot: https://prnt.sc/na-txBraOVqy.  Despite this, I made all the necessary changes requested by the client. Here are the screenshots: https://prnt.sc/lCa38R5eCwPJ, https://prnt.sc/OUV95GrZURXh. Once the project was completed and the website transferred to the client's domain, they expressed satisfaction. Now, they are requesting to cancel the project. However, I remain fully committed to making any necessary adjustments to ensure my client‚Äôs satisfaction.

reviews.comment: It was great working with Sadir on the WordPress website. He is a perfect candidate for website development, and I highly recommend him. I am looking forward to hiring him again.

seller_response.comment: Thanks, I'm glad you got what you wanted. I would love to work with you again.

reviews.comment: Al Sadir did an amazing job creating my webpage! Not only was the quality top-notch, but he also finished it ahead of schedule, which was a huge bonus. Super professional and easy to work with‚ÄîI highly recommend him!

seller_response.comment: A pleasure to work with you. Thank you so much :)

reviews.comment: Sadir did a great job building us a new company WordPress website. He was quick at making our website and was very responsive.

seller_response.comment: You're welcome, Such a Gentleman, Thank you.
